snippet.title: Dream Tactics | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Ready your decks, pick your characters, and prepare for battle! Innovating on the tactical RPG genre, Dream Tactics delivers strategic card combos and rich character customization.

The Pillows have taken over the Dream World! It is up to our unlikely hero, Neru, and her friends to defeat the Pillow Legions and wake everyone from eternal sleep.

Website:
https://www.playdreamtactics.com/

Steam Page:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1897650/Dream_Tactics/?utm_source=youtube

Sound Effect Credit:
https://freesound.org/people/craftcrest/sounds/349044/
